title: Prisma migrate dev executor
description: The migrate dev command updates your database using migrations during development and creates the database if it does not exist.

schema.description: Specifies the path to the desired schema.prisma file to be processed instead of the default path. Both absolute and relative paths are supported.

create-only.description: Creates a new migration based on the changes in the schema but does not apply that migration.

skip-generate.description: Skip triggering generators (for example, Prisma Client).
